name: 2021 International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science (5th ICAFS 2021)
content:
Dear Friends and Colleagues, 

 On behalf of the Organizing Committee, it is our great pleasure to welcome you to participate the [**2021 The 5th International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science** (5th ICAFS 2021)](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/) to be held **virtually online during October 28-30**, 2021\. (>>[General Information](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/about/)). 
 
_**Organizers**_

 The conference is organized by Asia-Pacific Association of Science Engineering and Technology, in cooperation with multiple academic affiliations. 
 
_**Topics**_ 
 It has been designed to provide an innovative and comprehensive overview of agricultural and food science. A focus will be given on: plant sciences; agronomy and agricultural sciences; Soil & Environmental Science; Food science and technology; agricultural environment, ecology and resources, etc. ([\>>More topics](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/about/#topics)). 
 
_**Previous**_ 
 ICAFS2020 was held virtual online ([\>>More details](https://icafs.apaset.org/2020/program/130.html)). [Previous ICAFS were succesfully held](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/about/archive/) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (2019), Istanbul, Turkey (2018) and Lahore, Pakistan (2017). 
 
**_Publication_** 
 Accepted abstracts will be published in conference abstract book. 
 After author's extension and peer-review by the committee, selected full papers related to agriculture, food, environment, etc., will be included in conference proceedings and published in [_IOP Conference Series: Earth and Environmental Science_](https://iopscience.iop.org/journal/1755-1315) (Print ISSN: 1755-1307, [indexed in](https://publishingsupport.iopscience.iop.org/questions/proceedings-are-abstracted-in/) Scopus, Ei Compendex, Web of Science-CPCI, etc). Published proceedings: [ICAFS2020 EES V705](https://iopscience.iop.org/issue/1755-1315/705/1), [ICAFS2019 EES V559](https://iopscience.iop.org/issue/1755-1315/559/1). ([\>>More details](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/cfp/)). 

_**Program**_ 
 On Oct. 28 wil be the pre-meetings for organizers and commitees. The full conference days will be virtually **online** on Oct. 29-30, for detailed [program please refer here](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/program/). 
 
 We look forward to having you join us for this fully online event ([\>>Register here](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/registration/)), and will be reaching out with complete details and the updated program shortly, for more details about registration please visit at [ICAFS2021 registration page](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/registration/). 
 Please also bring this notice to the attention of any of your colleagues who may be interested in participating in the conference ([Download Flyer](http://img.apaset.org/uploads/soft/ICAFS%5FFlyer.pdf "Please help circulate the conference information."), [Registration Form](http://img.apaset.org/uploads/soft/ICAFS%5FRegistration%5FForm.doc)). 
 
 Secretariat of ICAFS 2021

 On behalf of the Organizing Committee
organizers: Asia-Pacific Association of Science Engineering and Technology
